sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}

// Error: org.mozilla.javascript.EcmaError: TypeError: Cannot find function body in object 
function () {...}. (<Unknown source>#35) in <Unknown source> at line number 35

1.修复关键词搜索，匹配多本杂志时导致的书籍列表规则异常报错【2021/05/13】
2.添加书籍URL正则【2021/06/10】
3.修复作者留空，书名都是类似《2021年06期》，这样导致的不同杂志相同期号被错误的识别为同一本书。暂时作者栏填写为杂志名。【2021/07/02】
4.修复img标签/data-action造成的图片无法显示【2021/07/08】
5.修改书名，增加杂志名作为前缀，方便排序整理书架，例如：“2021年06期”改为“《读者》 - 2021年06期”【2021/08/21】
6.优化算法，正文净化插入的随机字符串由正则表达式改为jsoup remove,减少了误杀img链接的情况，逻辑更加清晰，准确定位到元素比全文匹配效率高。【2021/09/17】
7.增加匹配条件，解决上一版未能净化的漏网之鱼【2021/10/03】

<js>
result.match(/JSON.parse\('([^']+)'/)[1]
</js>
$.data_list[*].href
<js>
//java.log(result);
var list=[];
var option={
'charset': 'UTF-8',
'headers': {
    'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)'
    }
};

//获取期刊列表
for(i in result){
	var str='http://new-qk.lifves.com/' +String(result[i])+','+JSON.stringify(option);
	list.push(str);
}
java.log(list.length);
var res=[];
var num=4;
var len=list.length;

//分割并获取每一期刊内部刊数列表
for(i=0;i<len;i+=num){
	var ls=list.splice(0,num);
	java.log(list.length+','+ls.length);
	var temp=java.ajaxAll(ls);
	res.push(temp);
}
java.log('请求结束'+res.length);

//将列表整合成json
var json='[';
for(i in res){
	//java.log(i);
	for(j in res[i]){
	 var html=res[i][j].body();
	 var json1=html.match(/JSON.parse\('([^']+)'/)[1];
	 //java.log(json1);
	 json+=json1+',';
	}
}
json=String(json).slice(0,-1)+']';
JSON.parse(json);
</js>
$..data_list[*].list[*]

//书名修饰

	var t='《'+result[i].title+'》 - ';
	//java.log(t);
	result[i].span=result[i].span.replace(/^/,t);
}
result
</js>

bookSourceComment:
基于 PyFQWeb 项目开发的 Legado 兼容书源
/*
搜索模式默认是搜书
需要漫画则在关键字前加m:即m:系统
听书则为t:系统
*/

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var Res  = JSON.parse(result);
var data = Res.page || Res.data;
data = (Array.isArray(data) ? data[0] : data.book_info) || data;
var type = data.genre;
java.put("type",type);
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: book_name

ruleContent.content:
var item_id = java.hexDecodeToString(result); var book_id = java.get('book_id'); var type = String(java.get('type')); var v = JSON.parse(source.getVariable()); var sz = v.sz; var tone = v.tone; if (type == 1) { book.type = 64; } else if (type == 4 || sz != 0) { book.type = 32; } else if (sz == 0) { book.type = 8; } if (type == 4 || sz != 0) { if (type == 4) { url = source.bookSourceUrl + `/audio?tone_id=1&item_ids=${item_id}`; } else if (sz != 0) { url = source.bookSourceUrl + `/audio?${tone}&item_ids=${item_id}`; } try { result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]['main_url']; } catch(e) { result = "未知错误"; } } else { let url = source.bookSourceUrl + '/content2?item_id=' + item_id; let res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data.content; function getComic(result) { let mat = result.match(/
([\s\S]*?)<\/article>/); try { let cnt = JSON.parse( mat ? mat[1].replace(/\&/g, '"').replace(/\;/g, "").replace(/\#34/g, "") : result ); return (mat ? cnt.skeleton.data : cnt.picInfos) .map((i) => { let path = mat ? cnt.materials[i.element_name].data.web_uri : "novel-pic/" + i.md5; return ``; }) .join("
"); } catch (e) { // not comic content mat = result.match(/([\s\S]*?)<\/body>/) // java.log(result) return (mat ? mat[1] : result).toString().replace(/\<\!DOCTYPE html.*/g, "").replace(/\/, "").replace(/\\<\/a\>/g, "") } } result = getComic(String(res)); } result.replace(/\{\!\-\- PGC_VOICE\:.*\-\-\}/g, "") @@p@html||html

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function getBookIdFull(url) {
	const {java} = this
	$ = JSON.parse(url).data
	if ($.book_shelf_info != 0 && $.book_shelf_info != undefined) {
		arr = $.book_shelf_info.map($ => $.book_id)
	} else if (list = $.data_list != 0 && $.data_list != undefined)  {
		arr = $.data_list.map($ => $.book_id_str)
	} else {
		java.toast("获取 book_id 失败，你可能需要登录！")
	}
	return arr
}
let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {})['手动登录Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "未分组": []
  }
  // java.log(
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["未分组"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
  })
  
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}
JSON.stringify({data: result.book_info || result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data})
</js>

function a(str) {
	str = String(str);
	length = str.length / 2;
	bArr = [];
	for (i = 0; i < length; i++) {
		i2 = i * 2;
		bArr[i] =  intToByte(parseInt(str.substring(i2, i2 + 2), 16));
  }
  return bArr;
}
function intToByte(i) {
	var b = i & 0xFF;var c = 0;
	if (b >= 128) {c = b % 128;c = -1 * (128 - c);}
	else {c = b;}
	return c;
}

 function byteToHexString(arr) {
    return arr.reduce((accu, item) => {
        let a =(item&0xff).toString(16)
        if (a.length ==1) a = "0" + a
        return accu += a
    }, "")
  }
  function hextoBase64(t) {
	function parse(t) {
		t = String(t)
		for (var e = t.length, r = [], i = 0; i < e; i += 2){
		r[i >>> 3] |= parseInt(t.substr(i, 2), 16) << 24 - i % 8 * 4;
		}
		return r;
	}
	function stringify(t) {
		var e = t
		, r = 4 * t.length
		, i = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=";
		for (var n = [], o = 0; o < r; o += 3){
		    for (var s = (e[o >>> 2] >>> 24 - o % 4 * 8 & 255) << 16 | (e[o + 1 >>> 2] >>> 24 - (o + 1) % 4 * 8 & 255) << 8 | e[o + 2 >>> 2] >>> 24 - (o + 2) % 4 * 8 & 255, a = 0; a < 4 && o + .75 * a < r; a++){
			n.push(i.charAt(s >>> 6 * (3 - a) & 63));}
		}
		var c = i.charAt(64);
		if (c){
		   for (; n.length % 4; ){
			      n.push(c);}
		}
		return n.join("")
	}
	return stringify(parse(t));
}

sf = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
d=hextoBase64(byteToHexString(a(result)));
key = iv = "EaSoUcNt";

let replaceCover = (u) => {
// java.log(u)
if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
else u = u.substring(7)
let uArr = u.split("/")
uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
let uArr2 = []
uArr.forEach((x) => {
    if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
    else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
	})
u = uArr2.join("/")
return u
	}
  let list = [];

    if (data != null) {
    let requestData = { books: [] };
    for (let i in data) {
      requestData["books"].push({
        book_id: data[i]["book_id"],
        item_id: "0",
      });
    }
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(resultData.book_shelf_info))
    let booksData = java.ajax(
      'https://fanqienovel.com/api/bookshelf/multidetail,{method: "post",body: ' +
        JSON.stringify(requestData) +
        "}"
    );

        book_name: d.book_name,
        thumb_url: replaceCover(d.thumb_url),

		title: title,

				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")

.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/fanqx/)){
var a = baseUrl.match(/\/chapter\/(.*?)\.html/);
//java.log(a[1]);
let hrefList = [];
if (a) {
  var b = result.match(/data\-p\="\d+"/g).length;
  if (b) {
    for(let i = 1; i <= b; i++) {
      let href = `https://www.fanqxsw.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,{"body":"id=${a[1]}&page=${i}","method":"POST"}`;
     //java.log(href);
      hrefList.push(href);
    }
    hrefList
     }
}
}
else{
	var a = baseUrl.match(/\/chapter\/(.*?)\.html/);
//java.log(a[1]);
let hrefList = [];
if (a) {
  var b = result.match(/data\-p\="\d+"/g).length;
  if (b) {
    for(let i = 1; i <= b; i++) {
      let href = `https://www.kelexs.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,{"body":"id=${a[1]}&page=${i}","method":"POST"}`;
     //java.log(href);
      hrefList.push(href);
    }
    hrefList
     }
}
	}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: String(h+"s"+q),
	cookie: String(c)
}

hm = ";hm="+java.head(h+"/user/hm.html"+q, head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

Get = java.get(h+"/user/search.html"+q, head);
JSON.parse(Get.body())
.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));
</js>

      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "第一卷：默认"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = (book.getVariable("custom") != "" && book.getVariable("custom") != null) ? book.getVariable("custom") : source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      c.url  = source.bookSourceUrl +  `/content?item_id=${c.itemId}`;
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>

ruleContent.content:
let res = JSON.parse(result).data.content function getComic(result) { let mat = result.match(/
([\s\S]*?)<\/article>/); try { let cnt = JSON.parse( mat ? mat[1].replace(/\&/g, '"').replace(/\;/g, "").replace(/\#34/g, "") : result ); return (mat ? cnt.skeleton.data : cnt.picInfos) .map((i) => { let path = mat ? cnt.materials[i.element_name].data.web_uri : "novel-pic/" + i.md5; return ``; }) .join("
"); } catch (e) { // not comic content mat = result.match(/([\s\S]*?)<\/body>/) // java.log(result) return (mat ? mat[1] : result).toString().replace(/\<\!DOCTYPE html.*/g, "").replace(/\/, "").replace(/\\<\/a\>/g, "") } } result = getComic(String(res)); result.replace(/\{\!\-\- PGC_VOICE\:.*\-\-\}/g, "")

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
let replaceCover = (u) => {
// java.log(u)
if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
else u = u.substring(7)
let uArr = u.split("/")
uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
let uArr2 = []
uArr.forEach((x) => {
    if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
    else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
	})
u = uArr2.join("/")
return u
	}
  let list = [];
  let resultData = JSON.parse(result).data;
  // java.log(resultData)
  let data;
  if (resultData != null && resultData.book_shelf_info) {
    data = resultData.book_shelf_info;
    if (data != null) {
    let requestData = { books: [] };
    for (let i in data) {
      requestData["books"].push({
        book_id: data[i]["book_id"],
        item_id: "0",
      });
    }
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(resultData.book_shelf_info))
    let booksData = java.ajax(
      'https://fanqienovel.com/api/bookshelf/multidetail,{method: "post",body: ' +
        JSON.stringify(requestData) +
        "}"
    );
    // java.log(booksData)
    let books =  JSON.parse(booksData).data.detail_list;
    for (let i in books) {
      let d = books[i];
      list.push({
        src: d,
        book_name: d.book_name,
        thumb_url: replaceCover(d.thumb_url),
        abstract: d.abstract,
        book_id: d.book_id,
      });
    }
    }
  } else list = JSON.parse(result)[0].content
  JSON.stringify(list)
</js>$[*]
ruleExplore.name: $.book_name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
let res = JSON.parse(result)
let books

if (res.search_tabs) {
  res.search_tabs.forEach((i) => {
    if (i.tab_type == 3) books = i.data
  })
} else books = res.data

let results = []

books.forEach(w => {
  results.push(w.book_data[0])
})

JSON.stringify(results)
</js>$[*]

<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()).replace(/.*：/,'');
var book = {
	name: o('h2'),
	author: o('.block_txt2 p:eq(3)'),
	kind: o('.block_txt2 p:eq(4)') + ',' + o('.block_txt2 p:eq(5)').replace(/中|已/,''),
	latest: o('.block_txt2 p:eq(7)').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + o('.block_txt2 p:eq(6)').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.intro_info').replace(/\d+/, '').replace(/\s+/,'\n'),
	cover: J.select('.block_img2 img').attr('src'),
	url: 'http://www.shencou.com/read/' + parseInt(baseUrl.match(/id=(\d+)/)[1]/1000) + '/' + baseUrl.match(/id=(\d+)/)[1] + '/index.html',
};
book;
</js>

.replace(/\[|。/,'')

ruleBookInfo.downloadUrls:
<js>
if(baseUrl.indexOf('read')>-1){
	url = book.origin + '/' +java.getString("@@.readcontent@a@href")
	html = java.ajax(url)
	result = html.match(/var downloadurl = "([\s\S]+?)";/)[1]
}else{
	url = baseUrl.replace(/.*-(\d+).*/, "https://www.527txt.com/txt-xx/softdownfree.asp?softid=$1&ckm=mianfei")
	html = java.ajax(url)
	java.setContent(html)
	result = java.getString("@@text.第一下载地址(首选)@href")
}
</js>

{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content##正文卷.|正文.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|卷_|VIP章节.|免费章节.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字].*?[】）\)]}}•{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    java.setContent(ml)
    var txt = java.getString("#txt>p@text");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

<js>
//从豆瓣获取封面
var pic="";
let j=JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://book.douban.com/j/subject_suggest?q="+book.name));
j.map(o=>{
if(o.title==book.name){pic=o.pic}
});
if(pic.length<3&&j.length>0){
pic=j[0].pic;
}
result=pic
//java.log(result)
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
try{
	actyzm=result.match(/actyzm" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];
	button=result.match(/button" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];	
	url=java.get("url");
	code=String(url).replace(/\/sscc.*/,'')+"/member/getcode.asp";
	yzco=source.getVariable();
	function getOption(str,co){
  	hed={"Referer":url,"Cookie":co}
  	return JSON.stringify({"method":"POST",
"charset":"gb2312","body":"actyzm="+actyzm+"&yzm="+str+"&button="+button,"headers":hed});
  }
  function succes(){
		yzm=java.getVerificationCode(code);
		url+=","+getOption(yzm,"");
		hm=java.ajax(url);
		co=java.getCookie(url,"g3jy9sqo0ws");
   source.setVariable(yzm+',g3jy9sqo0ws='+co)
   return hm;
  }
	if(yzco&&yzco!=''){
		v=String(yzco).split(',');
		u=url+","+getOption(v[0],v[1]);
		result=java.ajax(u);
		if(/请输入验证码/.test(result)){
			java.longToast("  ！验证码过期或有误，重新获取  ！")
			result=succes();
		}
	}else{result=succes("");}
result
}catch(err){java.log(err);result}
</js>

var sk=java.get("sk");
var su=source.getKey();
var v=source.getVariable();
var so=/s.php/.test(baseUrl);
if(so){
	var bu=baseUrl.match(/^(.+)\/s.php/)[1];
if(bu!=su&&bu!=v){
	source.setVariable(bu);
	java.toast("地址变动，重新搜索加载！")
	result=java.ajax(baseUrl+`,{
		"body": "s=${String(sk)}",
		"method": "POST"}`);
		}
	}else{result=result}
	result;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
url:og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

<js> 
//注意：一般网站默认首页(即baseUrl)有搜索框，否则请填入搜索页面地址
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uam, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

$.chapter_name@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')

.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

searchUrl:
<js> 
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uaw, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}

searchUrl:
<js>
  u=source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1];
  cookie.removeCookie(u);
	hm=java.get(u,{});	cs=decodeURIComponent(String(hm.header("Set-Cookie")).replace(/[eE]xpires[^;]+;|[pP]ath=\/;|,|httponly|\s/g,'').replace(/^;|;$/g,''));	token=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(hm.body()).select('input[name="_token"]').attr('value');
	body="_token="+token+"&kw="+key;
	head={"cookie":cs}
	post={
		"method": "POST",
		"body":body,
		"headers":head
	}
u+"/search/,"+JSON.stringify(post)
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
h = "https://m.wpxs.cc/"
q = "?q=" + encodeURIComponent(java.get('key'));


c = "Hm_lvt_="+~~(new Date().getTime()/1e3);

head = {
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: String(h+"s"+q),
	cookie: String(c)
}

hm = ";hm="+java.head(h+"user/hm.html"+q, head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

Get = java.get(h+"user/search.html"+q, head);
JSON.parse(Get.body())
.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));
</js>

	url=java.get("url");
	code=String(url).replace(/\/sscc.*/,'')+"/member/getcode.asp";
	yzco=source.getVariable();
	function getOption(str,co){
  	hed={"Referer":url,"Cookie":co}
  	return JSON.stringify({"method":"POST",
"charset":"gb2312","body":"actyzm="+actyzm+"&yzm="+str+"&button="+button,"headers":hed});
  }
  function succes(){
		yzm=java.getVerificationCode(code);
		url+=","+getOption(yzm,"");
		hm=java.ajax(url);
		co=java.getCookie(url,"g3jy9sqo0ws");
   source.setVariable(yzm+',g3jy9sqo0ws='+co)
   return hm;
  }
	if(yzco&&yzco!=''){
		v=String(yzco).split(',');
		u=url+","+getOption(v[0],v[1]);
		result=java.ajax(u);
		if(/请输入验证码/.test(result)){
			java.longToast("  ！验证码过期或有误，重新获取  ！")
			result=succes();
		}
	}else{result=succes("");}
result
}catch(err){java.log(err);result}
</js>
.B

<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
try{
	actyzm=result.match(/actyzm" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];
	button=result.match(/button" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];	
	url=java.get("url");
	code=String(url).replace(/\/sscc.*/,'')+"/member/getcode.asp";
	yzco=source.getVariable();
	function getOption(str,co){
  	hed={"Referer":url,"Cookie":co}
  	return JSON.stringify({"method":"POST",
"charset":"gb2312","body":"actyzm="+actyzm+"&yzm="+str+"&button="+button,"headers":hed});
  }
  function succes(){
		yzm=java.getVerificationCode(code);
		url+=","+getOption(yzm,"");
		hm=java.ajax(url);
		co=java.getCookie(url,"g3jy9sqo0ws");
   source.setVariable(yzm+',g3jy9sqo0ws='+co)
   return hm;
  }
	if(yzco&&yzco!=''){
		v=String(yzco).split(',');
		u=url+","+getOption(v[0],v[1]);
		result=java.ajax(u);
		if(/请输入验证码/.test(result)){
			java.longToast("  ！验证码过期或有误，重新获取  ！")
			result=succes();
		}
	}else{result=succes("");}
result
}catch(err){java.log(err);result}
</js>

	yzco=source.getVariable();
	function getOption(str,co){
  	hed={"Referer":url,"Cookie":co}
  	return JSON.stringify({"method":"POST",
"charset":"gb2312","body":"actyzm="+actyzm+"&yzm="+str+"&button="+button,"headers":hed});
  }
  function succes(){
		yzm=java.getVerificationCode(code);
		url+=","+getOption(yzm,"");
		hm=java.ajax(url);
		co=java.getCookie(url,"g3jy9sqo0ws");
   source.setVariable(yzm+',g3jy9sqo0ws='+co)
   return hm;
  }
	if(yzco&&yzco!=''){
		v=String(yzco).split(',');
		u=url+","+getOption(v[0],v[1]);
		result=java.ajax(u);
		if(/请输入验证码/.test(result)){
			java.longToast("  ！验证码过期或有误，重新获取  ！")
			result=succes();
		}
	}else{result=succes("");}
result
}catch(err){java.log(err);result}
</js>

if (/内容正在载入/.test(result)) {

    url = result.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(su + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(su + ajax(c2))
    result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
}

while (/请输入验证码：/.test(result)) {
	img = `${su}/member/getcode.asp,{"headers":{"Referer":"${baseUrl}"}}`;

	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
	aa=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
	aa.select("[placeholder=请输入验证码]").attr("value",code)
	body=Array.from(aa.select("div.RegDiv form input"),x=>x.attr("name")+"="+x.attr("value")).join("&")
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{
  "body": "${body}",
  "charset": "GBK",
  "headers": {
"Referer": "${baseUrl}"
  },
  "method": "POST"
}`)
}

result

var lst = []
for (let i=start;i<=end;i++)
{lst.push([i-start+1,baseUrl.replace('story','page')+i+'.html'])}
result = lst
</js>

<js>
//第一章地址规则和章节序号RegExr
var sturl="text.开始阅读@href";
var stRe=/\/(\d{8})\.html/;

//从scr匹配最后一章序号的RegExr
var enRe=/<ul class="chapter">\s*<li>\s*<a href=".*?(\d{8})\.html"/;

sturl=java.getString(sturl);
start=parseInt(sturl.match(stRe)[1]);
end=parseInt(src.match(enRe)[1]);
star=source.getVariable()==""?start:parseInt(source.getVariable().match(stRe)[1]);n=end-start;if(n>2500){n=850;java.toast("😞正常阅读请删除源变量❗❗❗\n加载失败时，可在原网页将加载失败的网址复制到源变量再清理缓存❗❗❗")}else{};list=[];for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
{title=`第${i}章`;link=String(sturl)
.replace(start,star+i-1);
list.push({text:title,href:link})};list
</js>

.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>

//第一种方法
url="http:"+result.match(/<script>initTxt\(\"([^\s]+)\",/)[1];
result = java.ajax(url);
con=result.match(/"content":"([\S\s]+)","replace"/)[1];
rep =result.match(/"replace":\{([\S\s]+)\}\}\)/)[1];
con_=String(JSON.stringify(con));
Aaa=rep.replace(/"/g,"");
rep_=String(JSON.stringify(Aaa)).replace(/"/g,"");
BBB=rep_.split(",");

for(let i=0;i<BBB.length;i++)
{
	CCC=BBB[i].split(":");
	java.log(CCC[0]+"----"+CCC[1]);
	while(con_.indexOf(CCC[1])!=-1){
	con_=con_.replace(CCC[1],CCC[0]);
		}
}
result=con_.replace(/\\\\n/g,"\<br\>");

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说:|简介：)|各位书友.*/, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
h = String(source.getKey());
q = "?q=" + encodeURIComponent(java.get('key'));

c = "Hm_lvt_="+~~(new Date().getTime()/1e3);

head = {
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: String(h+"s"+q),
	cookie: String(c)
}

hm = ";hm="+java.head(h+"/user/hm.html"+q, head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

Get = java.get(h+"/user/search.html"+q, head);
JSON.parse(Get.body())
.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));
</js>
